name: Those Perished in Valorpath
description:
No steel bears harm to these monsters.

But with the power of many, humans may pass.
Those that fall dead in Valorpath rise as spirits, waiting for new warriors to fight the infestation. Only they can harm the foul beasts.
But still, the spirits are fragile without protection of the living. Protect their undeath, even at the cost of your own life...

Made for the Wowie Jam of 2021! Woohoo!

PRO TIPS

When you die, monsters recover. Don't die if you've made progress!
Wait for ghosts at the start of the level. They follow you!
Fireball enemies are dangerous, take them out first!
Fourth level is hard! Don't bother unless you wanna see big number (deathcount)

CONTROLS (they're in-game but just in case):

WASD or Arrows = Move
Shift or E or Right-click = Dash
(gives invincibility, dash into ghosts to give them invincibility too)

Space or F or Left-click = Sword (baah useless)
Escape or P = Pause
